Text: I don't doubt this has been cmpared with the documentaries of Michael Moore. Heck we can compare them to Citizen Kane or the Will it Blend? ads.

I guess it's trying to say that it's a political documentary that people who don't normally watch political documentaries can get into.  That's just my guess, though.

Thanks for the DVD!
